name: Invasion Of the Grave Robbers
description:
A first person shooter experience built in Unity. I wanted to flex my level design muscles a bit so I created this first person shooter. I wanted to create a bit of a spooky, yet quirky experience. I imagined creating a first person shooter with some of the silliness of Earthbound, but still capable of giving the player a bit of anxiousness. 

I hope you enjoy my game, Invasion of the Grave Robbers
